}}'''2.1.1432''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.1433''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.1431''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on September 26, 2018.

== Additions ==
* Added a kiosk software which can be toggled in <code>launcher_profiles.json</code>.
* Added 9 command-line options.
** <code>--clean</code>
*** This option deletes the <code>game</code> and <code>runtime</code> folders, including their contents, from the working directory.
** <code>--launcherui</code>
** <code>--workDir</code>
*** This option, followed by a path (relative or absolute), changes the location (and/or name) of the <code>.minecraft</code> folder.
*** Can be used to create a portable installation of the game. For example, <code>--workDir .</code> (or <code>--workDir=.</code>) can be used to make the launcher use the current directory (no matter what the current folder is called).
** <code>--nativeLauncherVersion</code>
** <code>--tmpDir</code>
*** This option, followed by a path (relative or absolute), changes the location (and/or name) of the <code>tmp</code> folder.
** <code>--lockDir</code>
** <code>--winTen</code>
*** This option adds support for Windows 10. Since the launcher now supports Windows 10 fully, this option is unnecessary and seems to have no effect.
** <code>--proxyHost</code>
** <code>--proxyPort</code>
